subject: News, changes, and stuff
msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I just wanted to take a moment to pass on a few things: JUnit won the JavaWorld editors choice for Best Java Performance Monitoring/Testing
messageBody:
Hello everyone, I just wanted to take a moment to pass on a few
things:

JUnit won the JavaWorld editors choice for Best Java Performance
Monitoring/Testing Tool. http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-03-
2002/jw-0326-awards.html

You can vote for JUnit in the Java Developers Journal 2002 Reader's
Choice awards.http://www.sys-con.com/java/readerschoice2002/

I've turned off attachments to the Group, we can use the files
section to accomplish the same thing and help limit the spread of
viruses.

I've turned on moderation of new group members to cut down on the
spam.

I've also changed the news page on JUnit.org, regular visitors will
probably find http://junit.org/news a quicker way to find out what is
new than the home page.

I'm going to be attending XP Agile Universe.
http://xpuniverse.com/home I'll be giving a tutorial with a coworker
on A Introduction to Test Driven Design. I was wondering if anyone
would be interested in a JUnit Birds of a Feather meeting?

Erik Meade
http://junit.org
emeade@...
